The Baron's tower looks pretty empty, though the bugs were enough to keep me running. Though at the top, I found one of the Baron's devices. With this device, I can transmute ingots into tokens and buy those grab bags at the trader. However, Overworld has no such tokens or traders, so I wonder if this thing can be modified to change the ingots into currency. Coins.
